name: BeagleBone Black
tagline: Design and Document files for the BeagleBone Black from BeagleBoard.org
body:
BeagleBone-Black
================

Design and Document files for the BeagleBone Black from BeagleBoard.org

Current Production Revision is C

# Web readable documents
* [System Reference Manual](https://beagleboard.github.io/BeagleBone-Black/BBB_SRM.pdf)
* [Bill of Materials](https://beagleboard.github.io/BeagleBone-Black/BBB_BOM.xml)
* [PDF Schematic](https://beagleboard.github.io/BeagleBone-Black/BBB_SCH.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
